website_summaries.verdict: A lot of color choices by design -- these are meant to be mixed up. Adds a colorful, fun element to all occasions.
pros: Plenty of colors available and they are meant to be mixed and matched
cons: Sold one place setting at a time and they are somewhat expensive

customer_reviews.title: Happy Dishes
customer_reviews.text: These made in USA dishes are hard to find anymore. I have a large number of these in many colors that decorate my kitchen glassed in cabinets. They are just fun dishes to have to mix and match and don't chip. In all the years I've had them for everyday use I've never chipped one. This latest poppy color ir a gorgeous orange/red color.
customer_reviews.author: NJY

customer_reviews.title: These Fiesta dishes are sturdy and beautiful!  A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about these Fiesta dishes. The Cobalt blue is a beautiful color. They have a nice weight to them. I have not used them yet but I hope that they live up to the claim of being able to not only go in dish washer and microwave, but the true test will be rather or not they can be used in the oven. Time and usage will tell. I would recommend this Fiesta product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just beginning my fiestaware collection due in part to all the great product reviews I've heard (they're sporting a lead free glaze and super durable). And the colors! This one is as vibrant in real life as it's picture suggests.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: I have shamrock, poppy, and sunflower in my collection. They arrive in perfect condition. This is the best price I've been able to find, cheaper than department stores when they're on sale. Not as cheap as the factory store in Newell, WV though. Which is a tour I'd recommend to any fiesta fan! Although I will say I hate the handle on the coffee cup
customer_reviews.author: Hali S.

customer_reviews.title: bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: Very deceitful it is only ONE place setting and when it was caught by me SCAMazon refunded on a gift card not to method of payment
customer_reviews.author: Penguin medic

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Even though the the set is heavy, they'll last my life time.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love Plum!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hmm not sure what to think... I was disappointed that while carefully opening the package I could already hear the glass on glass rattling. I feared that there would be product breakage; but thankfully there were only scratches caused by the rubbing and a few minor CHIPS!!! or cracks😳🙄 I'm surprised that there was no Homer Laughlin seal on the bowl in this set; but I must assume it's legit as every other item has it properly. I absolutely love plum and am so thrilled I found it at a great price! 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic and a great value
customer_reviews.text: We bought 10 sets, these are a classic; well made, good weight to them, and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Never disappoints!
customer_reviews.text: Fiesta ware does make every night, setting the table, a party. I love the color turquoise and it just makes me happy to use these plates and dishes.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful rich color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful rich color, simple design, perfect for any decor and would love it for myself, but bought bought for my daughter who is collecting these sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant colors
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my daughter. She's switching over to Fiesta Ware and loved the color
customer_reviews.author: Robi

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love that its Made in the USA, I love the weight, the color, the shine, everything. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: NYCer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fiesta Ware
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Fiesta dinnerware. The coffee cup is a little smaller than I am used to drinking from, but ok. Price is good as compared to stores and no shipping charge from Amazon; it arrived very fast and all intact. I am using it - it's Great!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Flaw on dinner plate
customer_reviews.text: Returning to seller and will re-order once the credit hits my account. Will request that sell use Fed EX and not UPS as everything arriving here in SW Colorado is covered is thick dust in the dry season due to our many dirt roads!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 12 sets of the white Fiesta ware! I love it and use it everyday. It was all packed extremely well with no breakage! I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Make your wife happy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife. She loves them. If she loves it, I love it. Make your wife happy, Get her some Fiesta....
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great dinnerware
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dinnerware to add to collection of colors. Fiesta ware has a 5 year chip warranty, which is almost unheard of.
customer_reviews.author: Pinchme

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Fiesta, easy to take care of and so colorful. Makes a it a very festive table.
customer_reviews.author: Irene chapman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing color!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite dinnerware of all time, and the color is beautiful. I don’t know how Homer Laughlin does it, but the colors all go together very well. It’s magic!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Test

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Fiestaware quality! I am starting my second full set for our vacation home with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product, LOVE the color! My dishes were well packed and arrived on time. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: SabineR21

customer_reviews.title: Dramatic!
customer_reviews.text: This set is the perfect addition to my other Fiesta dishes. Not a color you would expect from Fiesta, but it works great with all of the bright colors!
customer_reviews.author: Travis - Mckinney, TX

customer_reviews.title: Item description specifically says that the item is not visibly ...
customer_reviews.text: Item description specifically says that the item is not visibly damaged, but dinner plate is chipped on the top rim. Definitely visible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love my fiesta ware set and when I received this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my fiesta ware set and when I received this place setting in white, I was not disappointed! Adds beautifully to and enhances the other colors I have.
customer_reviews.author: susan howard

customer_reviews.title: This adds an awesome pop of color
customer_reviews.text: I have ten sets of fiesta. This adds an awesome pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Hodgkins

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this color to add to my Fiesta Place Settings
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this color to add to my Fiesta Place Settings. There is a joy from eating off different colors each day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great business!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, super fast delivery. Hope to get the same deal on the rest of my collection!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Fiesta!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. I collect Fiesta ware. Always looking for an authentic set at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Want to know when you have sales on fiesta ware. I love these plates.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best dinner ware
customer_reviews.text: Latest color to add to the ones we already have. This stuff looks and wears well over the years.
customer_reviews.author: T. Drake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product does not have retail packaging, but does contain the full dinnerware set.
customer_reviews.author: DRB

customer_reviews.title: Still kept it as they are so good (quality + looks)
customer_reviews.text: Got it by mistake. Still kept it as they are so good (quality + looks)
customer_reviews.author: Shailaja & swaroop

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact they are made in USA. More orange than pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fiesta makes it easy to support USA made products!
customer_reviews.text: Made in the USA, great quality and color as vibrant as ever. What more can you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Fiesta stoneware. I'm gradually picking up a place setting in 8 different colors.
customer_reviews.author: In Search of the Truth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed one more place setting to have 4 and she loves the product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Whiting

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well packed for shipping and the usual excellent Homer Laughlin FiestaWare.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: One of the pieces was broken, not very well packed for the price
customer_reviews.author: Dave M.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with white.
customer_reviews.text: I have just about every color of Fiestaware and love my Fiestaware, but was disappointed in this color. I give them 5 stars because the quality is still the same and color is good, but white is just so bland and blah. I am unimpressed with the color and wouldn't pick this color again. That is my personal preference, but if you love all the colors of Fiestaware this one will look bad up against their other vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and quality
customer_reviews.text: Broken piece in it (from reckless handling by FedEx employee), but resolved quickly with new set. Love the color and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Barry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the service and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen K Franks

customer_reviews.title: Love the Fiesta dinnerware line
customer_reviews.text: Love the Fiesta dinnerware line. The color in the picture is a little misleading as the product I received is a very vibrant orange.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't receive this color place setting. I received a green set and the mug is chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian M. Freiler

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Great product but Amazon packed without any stuffing. Broken dishes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The small plate arrived with a chip. I wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The small plate arrived with a chip. I wasn't able to return just that plate - I had to exchange the whole set.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Same as my comments on the lapis Fiesta place setting
customer_reviews.author: Martha L. Hinz

customer_reviews.title: I did not read the description very well. This ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not read the description very well. This "order" is for ONE set of a dinner plate, salad plate, small bowl and mug. YOU have to buy each set for as many table settings as you have .... if a table of four, then FOUR SETS.... if a table of six, then SIX SETS... etc...
customer_reviews.author: Star Fire

customer_reviews.title: & it wasn't in real good condition.
customer_reviews.text: It was quite expensive for this setting. I thought it was going to be 4 of each - not just 1 setting, & it wasn't in real good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Story

customer_reviews.title: Don't get between me and my Fiestaware!
customer_reviews.text: In the display window of a quaint little shop, I have admired the beautiful Fiestaware. My grandmother used Fiestaware in the 50's and 60's. One day I went in and bought two 4-piece place settings. Subsequently, I have bought several other colors. They're a pleasure to use. Maybe it's just me, but they seem to brighten my mood. Don't get between me and my Fiestaware!
customer_reviews.author: WriteRight2016

customer_reviews.title: We loved it! We already have the green
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my mom. We loved it! We already have the green, blue, yellow, and red set. I bought this poppy color hoping that it would be orangey and fall between the red and yellow we already have. It was perfect! It's definitely and orange color and it looks great with our other colors!
customer_reviews.author: anjelica

customer_reviews.title: nice dishes
customer_reviews.text: Although I am pleased with the dishes (other than the fact that they are made in China), I was very disappointed that one plate in each box was broken. So I only have 6 plates instead of 8.
customer_reviews.author: carol stanton

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful setting and we've purchased 8 more sets in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Lyons

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I love these plates! They are made well and look great. My mom has had these for almost 10 years and hasn't had any of them break or chip. My aunt also recently purchased them and loves them. Oh, be warned though, this lemongrass setting shows a tea cup style cup, but comes as a bigger coffee mug. The picture hasn't been updated yet. If you want to add a splash of color to your kitchen, get different colors. I got 8 settings, all different colors. Too fun.
customer_reviews.author: Bertholamu

customer_reviews.title: Made in America
customer_reviews.text: We purchased six different colors of the Fiesta and it became our everyday table setting. We decided to add the Cobalt. Now we have seven different colors but of greater importance is all the Fiesta place settings are made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Fiesta ware is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We now have many place settings and they are great! Colorful and easy to care for too. It arrived early, I was told it wouldn’t be here for Christmas but it got here in plenty of time. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Proud American

customer_reviews.title: GREAT deal, LOVE THE COLOR!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect in every way. Not only do I love the set itself, the delivery was perfect, shipped fast, packed VERY well. I bought 4 different colors at once and all four sets were packed in the same very large box. They were packed so professionally, with customized boxes. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: JoanneR

customer_reviews.title: beautiful - but watch the cup handles.
customer_reviews.text: I just wish the handles on the cups were larger. Very small and folks with large fingers can not use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with Fiesta!
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong with Fiesta! I have been using Fiestaware for years and they have never disappointed me! We recently remodeled our kitchen so I decided to change up the colors to the Ivory and Paprika. I also have Cobalt Blue but have put those away for now. They are great dishes, safe to put in the dishwasher and are very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: I love Fiesta ware.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in great condition - no chips or cracks. Looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Sitkin

customer_reviews.title: Love my Fiesta
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Fiesta plateware, etc., colors. Literally festive on the table and anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Morris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are quality dishes & the color is lovely. More cinnamon (brown/orange) in actuality but lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Houk

customer_reviews.title: These are the nicest plates I've ever used. We ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the nicest plates I've ever used. We have a family of six and even with all the hustle and bustle, we haven't had one chip in any piece.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Beacom

customer_reviews.title: Other than that I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: This dinnerware is not as red as I hoped it would be. It's a lighter color than what I was looking for. Other than that I like it a lot. It's a pretty place setting I will happily use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Burden

customer_reviews.title: 🇮🇹Olay! Fiesta dinnerware '
customer_reviews.text: Love this dinnerware! I am trying to get at least 6 place settings. I love the beautiful colors; thus Fiesta! I have Turquoise and now Paprika. I see that Fiesta has glasses which I would like to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I love my fiestaware
customer_reviews.text: I love my fiestaware. I especially love the fact that it's made in the USA. Very sturdy quality dishware. I am ordering one at time but my goal is to have a set of 12 in multicolor. So far I have six place settings.. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ldg92553

customer_reviews.title: Good job amazon
customer_reviews.text: Great Love these dishes thank you nice delivery man. Thanks again👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: OK, but more orange than red. Should be called some color other than "Scarlet". The picture is very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It's genuine first quality Fiesta Ware at a Great price. Enough said.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the fiesta setting was even better than I expected extremely happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: charliep

customer_reviews.title: gift for me!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted Fiestaware for a long time. Durable, beautiful and fun...so glad to have them!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: New Dishes
customer_reviews.text: Love my new dishes! Arrived quickly and love the color.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Returned for claret which is much better.
customer_reviews.text: The picture does not depict the color well at all. These are a bright lime green, something I would never use. Returned for claret which is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looked the original
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for a set we bought 8 years ago
customer_reviews.author: jo-krisenterprise

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and fun addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love these sets and can't beat the price. Working on swapping out all our current dishes with these. Each time we buy a set we throw out one of our old plates, bowls and cups.
customer_reviews.author: RKS

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color! I only wish I had the tea ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color! I only wish I had the tea cup for the setting but not everyone is a tea cup fan.
customer_reviews.author: Laura, New Hampshire

customer_reviews.title: Sent as a wedding gift.
customer_reviews.text: Fiesta ware is a good quality dish. I'm sure the bride and groom were pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Set came promptly and carefully packed. It's an interesting color. At first, I wasn't sure I liked it, but it has really grown on me. I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: IJK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color - nice addition to my FiestaWare collection
customer_reviews.text: I have been adding pieces to my FiestaWare collection and this paprika set goes well with my turquoise and cobalt pieces. I love this color - somewhere between a rich brownish orange and brick red. My only negative comment about this 4-piece paprika set is that the loop handle on the mug is small (I can only insert one finger) unlike those in my turquoise and cobalt mugs where I can insert 2-3 fingers. My husband would not use the paprika mug because only his pinkie will fit into the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Vanina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: As always, wonderful Fiesta and such a pretty color to add to my rainbow!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Normandin

customer_reviews.title: So happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I would give 6 stars if I could! They arrived in PERFECT condition (advertised as used) completely exceeding my expectations. I love to cook and bake and these will make my food look so much more scrumptious! :)
customer_reviews.author: Kaeli Kaainoa

customer_reviews.title: Is It Fiesta Ware or is it Ware
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this is Fiesta Ware. None of the pieces have any mark on the bottom where Fiesta Ware always has their Fiesta Ware mark. The box was open, which makes me think it was an open box item sold as new.
customer_reviews.author: oldcustomer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding dishes
customer_reviews.text: Fiesta ware is an excellent brand of dish ware. I was impressed with the cost and how well packaged the dishes were. Color on-line matches the color of dishes preteen close.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love Fiesta stoneware. Durable and easy to buy, mix and match
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: Gift for Granddaughter and with these 2 sets, she now has 10 place settings for her Fiestaware. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Kukuk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my fiesta wear in all my favorite colors! Practical, durable and fun!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Clark-Hagey

customer_reviews.title: Love Fiesta Ware!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my fiesta ware!! We use it every day! (no chips, yet, our cheap Walmart set did not hold up at all compared to these!) the colors are so vibrant! No need to worry about lead getting into our food, if 1 would chip.....The bowl, in the set is the ideal size for morning cereal, the dinner plate is just right (not too big and not too small) there is a small plate for deserts or whatevers; and the coffee mug is just the right size...I was iffy, but I really like the handle on it!
customer_reviews.author: Lover of Books!!

customer_reviews.title: best dinnerware
customer_reviews.text: Love fiestaware. ..just added this color. Made in America...can't beat that!
customer_reviews.author: Grace J.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! All were shipped with no damage
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! All were shipped with no damage. I am thrilled with my place settings!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Fiestaware!
customer_reviews.text: Fiestaware is a new find for me. I stayed away for a long time because I didn't realize how great the products really are! The coloring is beautiful. The options in style are fabulous. I have had these dishes for a while now and love them more and more! They are sturdy and durable. I love Fiestaware and highly recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: Poppy is orange
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, superb quality. Caveat: The poppy color appears much more red in the pictures. It is actually the color of clementine oranges. Very nice, but by no means a shade of red.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Worthington

customer_reviews.title: ... photo but I'm still giving 5 stars because I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: The color was a bit lighter than the photo but I'm still giving 5 stars because I LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Ebert

customer_reviews.title: The  claret color is almost the same as cinnabar.  I thought it would be different.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the claret color. It looked brighter in the picture. It is almost indistinguishable from the cinnabar set that I already have. Also, there is a flaw on the bottom of one of the dishes. There is a white spot where it should be colored.
customer_reviews.author: WillowDaisy

customer_reviews.title: Helpful service people saved the day
customer_reviews.text: This was a wedding shower gift for a nephew and his bride...EXACTLY what they wanted and had listed on another registry, but more cost effective. The superior service was also a blessing as I typed in the wrong address and AMAZON went out of their way to help me get this delivered on tine for the shower....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, dishes are really heavy. Food looks good sitting on the plate. They are pretty in the cabinet, it's like a party when you open the cabinet door.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M. Collins

customer_reviews.title: woot woot poppy! awesome special color.
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute! the Poppy color is much nicer in real life than the photo and i'm really glad we added them to our collections. woot woot Poppy!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Solid and lead free.
customer_reviews.text: I used my first alert lead test kit on these and they do appear to be lead free if anyone is interested. I couldn't find any actual 3rd party tests on fiesta ware, just claims. Great, solid, US made dishware.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Lee Davis

customer_reviews.title: I've heard great things about Fiesta products
customer_reviews.text: I've heard great things about Fiesta products. I purchased these in my College colors for game days. I have to admit I didn't read the product description correctly. I thought I was ordering a 4-place setting instead of the 4-piece setting. That being said, when I received the boxes I was disappointed that I didn't read it correctly. I just don't see how the product is worth the price. There is no way I would pay over $100 for a 4-place setting. They seem ok quality, just not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice thought!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a 16 piece service for 4 so I returned it. Looked nice thought!
customer_reviews.author: Vicky S

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with fiestaware.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying fiestaware for my daughter, this is the first set that the two plates were not stamped as fiestaware on the bottom. Are they true fiestaware?
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Too bad. This is one product I have to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the dishes had a glazing defect. Too bad. This is one product I have to buy in store.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Marie

product_meta.title: Fiesta 4-Piece Place Setting, Shamrock
product_meta.description: Color:ShamrockFiesta 4-Piece Place Setting manufactured by The Homer Laughlin China Company. America's largest domestic producer of dinnerware and the sole manufacturer of all Fiesta dinnerware. All Fiesta pieces are Microwave safe, Oven-proof, Dishwasher safe, Freezer proof, Lead-Free and Made in America with the implementation of many green practices. The very durable glaze is great for everyday use. Fiesta as a pattern has stood the test of time and is typically passed down from one generation to the next. We have kept the pattern constant through the years so that you can count on us to be here when you decide to expand or change your collection. New pieces and colors are added every so often to keep things interesting. Currently, Fiesta is the most collected dinnerware in America.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars254 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
